BC_NOT_CONFIGURED: Biofuel is not specified in production site configuration
DEPRECATED_MP: Wine residues will disappear in favor of two new raw materials: Grape Marc and Wine Lies. Please update your declarations accordingly.
GHG_EL_NEG: Reductions from land use change are below zero (EL)
MAC_BC_WRONG: Biofuel incompatible with release for consumption (only ED95 or B100 are allowed)
MISSING_FEEDSTOCK_COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN: Feedstock country of origin is missing
MISSING_PRODSITE_CERTIFICATE: No certificate linked to your production site configuration
MISSING_PRODUCTION_SITE_COMDATE: Production site date of commissioning is missing
MP_BC_INCOHERENT: Feedstock is not compatible with biofuel
MP_NOT_CONFIGURED: Feedstock is not specified in production site configuration
DEPOT_NOT_CONFIGURED: This delivery site is not associated to your company. Please check your settings.
NOT_ENOUGH_VOLUME_LEFT: The quantity of the parent stock is not sufficient to extract this batch. The quantity has been reset
PRODUCTION_SITE_COMDATE_FORMAT_INCORRECT: Date of commissioning format is incorrect
INVALID_DOUBLE_COUNTING_CERTIFICATE: Invalid double account certificate for this delivery date
COULD_NOT_FIND_PRODUCTION_SITE: The production site is not configured on your company page
EEC_WITH_RESIDUE: Non-conventional feedstock GHG emissions related to extraction and cultivation should be 0
MISSING_COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN: Feedstock country of origin is missing
UNKNOWN_COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN: Feedstock country of origin is not recognized
UNKNOWN_DELIVERY_COUNTRY: Delivery site country is not recognized
ETD_HIGHER_THAN_DEFAULT: Transport and Distribution GHG emissions higher than default value
ETD_NO_EU_TOO_LOW: Transport and Distribution GHG emissions smaller than the default value
ETD_EU_DEFAULT_VALUE: Transport and Distribution GHG emissions still has the default value
ETD_ANORMAL_HIGH: Transport and Distribution GHG emissions abnormally high
EEC_ANORMAL_LOW: Extraction and Culture GHG emissions abnormally high
EEC_ANORMAL_HIGH: Extraction and Culture GHG emissions abnormally low
YEAR_LOCKED: The delivery date is too old. It is no longer possible to declare on this period.
PRODUCTION_SITE_ADDRESS_UNDEFINED: The address, the city or the zipcode of the production site is not completed. Please add it to information related to the company.
APPLICATION_ALREADY_RECEIVED: An equivalent double counting application already exists or is being validated.
MISSING_VENDOR_CERTIFICATE: Your company is neither the supplier nor the client of this batch: you must provide your trading certificate to justify your role as an intermediary in this transaction.
DECLARATION_ALREADY_VALIDATED: The lot's period has already been declared: cancel the corresponding declaration in order to modify it.
DELIVERY_DATE_VALIDITY: The delivery date of the batch is prior to the date of receipt of the stock from which it originates.
